TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ConnectionsZoneDesigner extends System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZoneDesigner

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner> 提供的設計階段表示法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>具有存取功能表控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.AutoFormats%2A>集合和<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZoneDesigner.ViewInBrowseMode%2A>網頁開發人員的方便性，不論屬性。 它是唯一不支援設計工具區域的區域設計工具。 這是因為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>控制所使用的連結來建立連線，而不是拖放的使用者介面 (UI)。
<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.AutoFormats%2A>集合和<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZoneDesigner.ViewInBrowseMode%2A>同時出現的動詞命令功能表的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>控制項。 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.AutoFormats%2A>選取，讓選取的色彩配置。 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZoneDesigner.ViewInBrowseMode%2A>核取方塊，選取時，就會出現在瀏覽器中，顯示控制項的內容; 之前建立的連接時，控制項將會是空的。
您可以繼承自<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner>以支援自訂<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>控制如同其他控制項設計工具。 您可以覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>方法，以變更呈現控制項的標記。 您也可以覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.AutoFormats%2A>要加入集合<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection>與自訂配置。
## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何隱藏其他屬性，來自自訂<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>藉由覆寫控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A>方法。
[!code-csharp[WebPartsDesigners_ConnectionsZoneDesigner_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebPartsDesigners_ConnectionsZoneDesigner_Overview/CS/ConnectionsZoneSample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WebPartsDesigners_ConnectionsZoneDesigner_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebPartsDesigners_ConnectionsZoneDesigner_Overview/vb/connectionszonesample.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property AutoFormats As DesignerAutoFormatCollection

Docs.summary: Gets the collection of predefined automatic formatting schemes to display in the **Auto Format** dialog box for the associated control at design time.
Docs.value: 預先定義與預設 ConnectionZone 配置。

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.AutoFormats%2A>屬性會覆寫其基底實作，以取得預先定義的集合所特有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>類別。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string GetDesignTimeHtml() cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetDesignTimeHtml () As String

Docs.summary: Gets the markup that is used to represent the control at design time.
Docs.returns: A that is the markup to represent the control at design time.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Initialize(class System.ComponentModel.IComponent component) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub Initialize (component As IComponent)

Docs.param: The control associated with the designer.
Docs.summary: Binds the designer to the specified control.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void PreFilterProperties(class System.Collections.IDictionary properties) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub PreFilterProperties (properties As IDictionary)

Docs.param: An of the set of properties associated with the control.
Docs.summary: Hides a preset group of properties at design time.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A>方法會覆寫父方法以隱藏<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.EmptyZoneTextStyle%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartChromeStyle%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartStyle%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartTitleStyle%2A>設計工具中的屬性。 這是因為有問題的屬性不會轉譯<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>控制項並因此不相關。
## Examples 如需如何覆寫的範例<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A>方法，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner>類別概觀主題。
